bigshot

Class EquirectangularToCubic

  • java.lang.Object
    • bigshot.AbstractCubicTransform<Derived>
      • bigshot.AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<EquirectangularToCubic>
        • bigshot.EquirectangularToCubic

  • public class EquirectangularToCubic
extends AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<EquirectangularToCubic>
    Transforms an equirectangular image map to rectilinear images. Used to create a cube map for bigshot.VRPanorama.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class bigshot.AbstractCubicTransform

        AbstractCubicTransform.TransformedFace

    • Method Detail

      • input

        public EquirectangularToCubic input(Image input)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCubicTransform
        Sets the image map. Once set, the AbstractCubicTransform.transform() method can be called several times with other parameters being adjusted between calls.
        Overrides:
        input in class AbstractCubicTransform<EquirectangularToCubic>

      • fromHuginPtoParameters

        public EquirectangularToCubic fromHuginPtoParameters(int w,
                                            int h,
                                            double v,
                                            int cropLeft,
                                            int cropRight,
                                            int cropTop,
                                            int cropBottom)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCubicTransform
        Sets the required projection parameters from the Hugin .pto parameters. The Hugin pto describes an image that is w pixels wide and h pixels tall. It has a horizontal field of view of v degrees. From that image, a sub-rectangle with top-left coordinates (cropLeft, cropTop) and bottom-right coordinates (cropRight, cropBottom) has been rendered and is the actual input image to the projection.
        Specified by:
        fromHuginPtoParameters in class AbstractCubicTransform<EquirectangularToCubic>
        Parameters:
        w - the width of the map image, in pixels
        h - the height of the map image, in pixels
        v - the horizontal field of view, in degrees
        cropLeft - the first used column of the image
        cropRight - one past the rightmost used column of the image
        cropTop - the first used row in the image
        cropBottom - one past the bottom-most used row of the image

      • invTransformPoint

        protected void invTransformPoint(int x,
                     int y,
                     Point2D output)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSphericalCubicTransform
        Transforms an image map coordinate to a ray in 3d-space.
        Specified by:
        invTransformPoint in class AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<EquirectangularToCubic>
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate in the image map.
        y - the y-coordinate in the image map.
        output - the result of the transformation. Gives the ray angle in radians as x = theta, y = phi

      • transformPoint

        protected void transformPoint(double theta,
                  double phi,
                  Point2D output)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSphericalCubicTransform
        Transforms a ray in 3d-space, given by theta and phi to image map coordinates.
        Specified by:
        transformPoint in class AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<EquirectangularToCubic>
        Parameters:
        theta - the yaw angle of the ray, in radians. Increases clockwise.
        phi - the pitch angle of the ray, in radians. Increases downwards.
        output - the result of the transformation. Gives the image map coordinates in pixels

      • transformToFace

        public static Image transformToFace(Image in,
                    int outputSize,
                    double vfov,
                    double oy,
                    double op,
                    double or,
                    double yaw,
                    double pitch,
                    double roll)
                             throws Exception
        Transforms an equirectangular map to a rectilinear image.
        Parameters:
        in - the equirectangular image map
        outputSize - the size (width and height), in pixels, of each face
        vfov - the vertical field of view, in degrees
        oy - the initial yaw offset, in degrees
        op - the initial pitch offset, in degrees
        or - the initial roll offset, in degrees
        yaw - the yaw angle of the viewer, in degrees
        pitch - the pitch angle of the viewer, in degrees
        roll - the roll angle of the viewer, in degrees
        Throws:
        Exception

      • transformToFace

        public static void transformToFace(File imageName,
                   File output,
                   int outputSize,
                   double vfov,
                   double oy,
                   double op,
                   double or,
                   double yaw,
                   double pitch,
                   double roll)
                            throws Exception
        Transforms an equirectangular map to a rectilinear image.
        Parameters:
        imageName - the equirectangular image map
        output - the output file name
        outputSize - the size (width and height), in pixels, of each face
        vfov - the vertical field of view, in degrees
        oy - the initial yaw offset, in degrees
        op - the initial pitch offset, in degrees
        or - the initial roll offset, in degrees
        yaw - the yaw angle of the viewer, in degrees
        pitch - the pitch angle of the viewer, in degrees
        roll - the roll angle of the viewer, in degrees
        Throws:
        Exception
